channel.title: how i become a jonin in season 2..
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "how i become a jonin in season 2.."

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: It's not too hard, but you do need plenty of luck, and you have to eat a lot of greassy foods to even get a chance to pass. I passed it on my 3rd or 4th go. So yeah…

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: Completing BurgerNinja (getting the Power of Greass) would likely be really hard in S2. You need to be able to complete Shift Manager of Doom, which is harder than Revenge, Over the Edge or Bingo'ing a Kage.

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: Actually, you can get Blood of the Reaper as a Special Jonin. You just need Shikai for that, and for that you just need MC Stripeypants, who you can get from B-Level reaper missions.

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded:
Actually you cant get blood of the reaper yet so…

1. Starting Bloodline
2. The Trade (200 style points from bingoing)
3. Wasteland Disease (From being Bingoed and completing the special mission "REVENGE")

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: Actually, i'm season 1 and i have Legacy, Reaper Blood, and Wasteland Disease. To get Wasteland, is pretty easy. Get a base range of 13 or 14 for your Genjutsu. Then use Welcome to GoodBurger on that Revenge special mission. You need TasyBurgers ( tradeable).. and you're off. The rest are easier, cant say i have patience to finish Burger missions.

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: Ya know, actually, I think the Greass bloodline is alot easier than the Trade or Wasteland, in my opinion. Of course, that could be because I like doing the missions. Reaper definitely is the way to go for the second one, though.

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded:
need 3 bl mean = starting bl + reaper bl ( easy to get - use Reaper guide ) + Trade bl ( better than wasteland bl. u just need 200 style point for trade bl lv.1 (for this mission, better if u use season dont fear theme + 10x Edut Jutsu for ur last attack ( stamina target <= 5 ). also if u want to do bingoing chose ur target 2 or 3 level under urs. Hyuk + trade bl lv.1 will join u soon. +right after that if u still have 1 note page to bingoing ur elder target. +anonymous if some1 want to bingoed u use their note page. that will make u easy access to trade bl lv.2 ) :D
btw, if some1 can bingoed me for anonymous. D0NC25 at Murder Village.
tq

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: Just follow the guides until you notice that you have a new bloodline for each of those.

item.title: Re: how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded: i saw this but i dont understand ho to get this abilities

how i become a jonin in season 2..
item.content:encoded:

so dosnt matter what can i do!!
